name: Versable
headline: AI powered product description enhancement for the auto parts industry
description:
Auto parts retailers get product data from hundreds of manufacturers that is inaccurate and inconsistent, often with big gaps in key values. They currently have a team of "catalog managers" who are required to process and enhance this data line by line, resulting in a week to months long lag between receiving product data and actually being able to start generating revenue from those products. 

Versable leverages AI to scan the web for tens of millions of auto parts listings, and uses a fine-tuned LLM with RAG to instantly process, enhance, and transform data. With just a part number, Versable is able to generate market-ready titles, product descriptions, and specs, in any format that's needed.

founders.name: Christina Seong, Founder
founders.description:
Seoul>Vancouver>SF>LA
UC Berkeley 
Alpine Investors
Salesforce

[![Versable Logo](https://www.versable.ai/images/svgs/linkedin-button.svg)](https://www.versable.ai/<https:/www.linkedin.com/company/versableai>)
Supercharge your product data to help you sell
Create, enhance, and transform your product data in minutes, not weeks. With just a part number, Versable's AI engine creates ready-to-use product copies to help you sell.
[Book a demo](https://www.versable.ai/<https:/calendly.com/tina-versable>)[Learn More](https://www.versable.ai/<#learn-more>)
![Product](https://www.versable.ai/images/svgs/hero-table.svg)![Highlight Row](https://www.versable.ai/images/svgs/hero-image-3.svg)![Processing](https://www.versable.ai/images/svgs/hero-image-2.svg)
![YCombinator Logo](https://www.versable.ai/images/svgs/Ycombinator.svg)![autocare Logo](https://www.versable.ai/images/svgs/autocare.svg)
What can I do with Versable?
Versable's AI engine is designed to save months of time spent optimizing your product description data. Product applications are endless, but here are a few
Process
If you have a part number, we can fill in every missing gap to create a market-ready product listing, complete with descriptions, features & benefits, and more
![map app](https://www.versable.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fsvgs%2Fmap-app.png&w=1080&q=75)
Enhance
Enhance your copy by including a unique brand voice, optimized for search engines. Enhance and resize your images
![map app](https://www.versable.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fsvgs%2Fmap-app.png&w=1080&q=75)
Transform
Maximize your sales by transforming your data to fit the carious content guidelines across every platform you want to sell on
![map app](https://www.versable.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fsvgs%2Fmap-app.png&w=1080&q=75)
![map bg](https://www.versable.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fsvgs%2Fmap-page.png&w=1920&q=75)
Why Versable?
And why ChatGPT doesn’t work for automotive.
![map app](https://www.versable.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fsvgs%2Fexplain-bg.png&w=3840&q=75)![map app](https://www.versable.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fsvgs%2Fexplain-app.png&w=1920&q=75)
[Built for Automotive ContextVersable is fine-tuned with millions of automotive-specific parts data, ensuring accurate classification and detailed descriptions that understand the context of each part—no generic keyword matching.Read More ](https://www.versable.ai/<https:/www.linkedin.com/posts/versableai_ai-machinelearning-dataaccuracy-activity-7250575308024659968-aZNu/>)[No Hallucination, Just AccuracyOur programmatic guardrails eliminate AI hallucinations, providing only verified, reliable data. We ensure only reliable, verified data is provided, so you can trust every output we generate—no guesswork involved.Read More ](https://www.versable.ai/<https:/www.linkedin.com/posts/versableai_ai-machinelearning-dataaccuracy-activity-7253099532631093248-b_8s/>)[Scalable and EfficientVersable is built to handle the large-scale demands of the automotive industry. Whether managing thousands or hundreds of thousands of parts, we deliver fast, accurate results that grow with your business.Read More ](https://www.versable.ai/<https:/www.linkedin.com/company/versableai/posts/>)
Designed for the Auto Industry
Our proprietary AI model is trained with millions of auto parts listings, content guidelines, and industry-leading databases to provide a solution custom for anyone in the aftermarkets
[Book a demo](https://www.versable.ai/<https:/calendly.com/tina-versable>)
![Retailers](https://www.versable.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fsvgs%2Fusp-retailers.png&w=750&q=75)
Retailers
![Manufacturers](https://www.versable.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fsvgs%2Fusp-manufacturers.png&w=750&q=75)
Manufacturers
![Industry Partners](https://www.versable.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fsvgs%2Fusp-industry.png&w=750&q=75)
Industry Partners
![Hero background image](https://www.versable.ai/images/svgs/bg.svg)
Frequently asked questions
Answered by our AI engine
How do you improve product accuracy?
+
We utilize advanced natural language processing technologies to analyze your product data and generate accurate and detailed descriptions. By leveraging a vast database of auto parts specifications and industry terminology, we ensure that descriptions are not only accurate but also technically precise, reducing errors and inconsistencies
Are you the same thing as chatGPT?
+
We're designed specifically for the auto parts industry, and our model is trained with millions of parts listings. This specialization includes tailored capabilities to integrate with inventory systems, understand industry-specific terminology, and optimize content for search engines relevant to auto parts.
What's coming next?
+
Direct integrations with your data source and ecommerce platforms, automatic kitting/bundling recommendations, and advanced analytics to measure the impact of our listing on your sales. Sign up to be the first to know when our new features go live!
Can you enhance images?
+
Yes. We are able to resize and enhance existing images that come with your parts currently. Our database includes millions of parts images, so we are also able to generate brand new images of parts with missing images.
Is there a limit to the number of parts you process?
+
No. Our bulk upload system is designed to be scalable and can handle listings ranging from a few hundred to several tens of thousands at a time without compromising on performance
What is your pricing model?
+
We are currently in our beta trials with a monthly subscription model that scales with the number of parts you want to process.
The Future of Your Data Starts Here
Sign up

generated_description:
### Versable: Revolutionizing the Auto Parts Industry

**Overview**  
Founded in 2021 and part of Y Combinator’s W22 batch, Versable is spearheading a transformation in the auto parts sector through AI-driven product description enhancement. The company is based in Los Angeles and operates with a lean team of three. Their mission? Simplifying the way auto parts retailers manage product data by providing accurate, comprehensive, and market-ready listings.

**The Problem**  
Auto parts retailers often struggle with product data from numerous manufacturers that is riddled with inaccuracies and inconsistencies. Traditionally, teams of catalog managers sift through this data line by line, leading to delays ranging from weeks to months before new products even hit the shelves.

**The Solution**  
Enter Versable. By leveraging cutting-edge AI technologies, including a fine-tuned large language model (LLM) with Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), Versable can scan the web for millions of auto parts listings to instantly enhance product data. With just a part number, they generate relevant titles, product descriptions, and specifications tailored for any sales platform—all in the blink of an eye.

**Key Features**  
1. **Process**: Input a part number, and Versable fills in the gaps, crafting complete product listings with detailed descriptions and benefits.
   
2. **Enhance**: The AI engine adds a unique brand voice and optimizes content for search engines, enhancing market visibility.
   
3. **Transform**: The tool adapts product data to comply with diverse content guidelines across multiple e-commerce platforms, maximizing sales potential.

**Why Choose Versable?**  
Versable isn’t just another AI tool—it's specifically designed for the automotive industry. Here’s why it stands apart: 

- **Accuracy Over Hallucination**: Its proprietary model is trained with automotive-specific data, reducing guesswork and ensuring reliable outputs.
- **Scalability**: Capable of managing thousands of parts efficiently, it grows with your business needs.
- **Integration**: Future developments will include direct integrations with inventory and e-commerce platforms, along with advanced analytics to track performance.

**Current Developments**  
Versable is in beta with a subscription pricing model that scales with the volume of parts processed. They aim to roll out additional features soon, enhancing users’ ability to manage their product data seamlessly.

**Conclusion**  
If you're in the auto parts retail business and tired of slow, redundant data entry processes, Versable is your next big leap into efficiency and accuracy. Supercharge your product listings and start selling smarter. Curious to see it in action? [Book a demo here](https://www.versable.ai/<https:/calendly.com/tina-versable>).

**Website**: [Versable](https://www.versable.ai/)  
**LinkedIn**: [Versable on LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/company/versableai)  
**Tags**: #ArtificialIntelligence #Manufacturing #DataEngineering #Automotive #LosAngeles
